channel.title: AI Daily News
channel.description: Daily coverage of AI agent frameworks: OpenClaw, Claude Code, OpenCode, Google ADK

item.title: OpenClaw: The AI Agent Taking Over WhatsApp
item.description: Through several name changes and mounting controversy, OpenClaw has emerged as the most talked-about AI agent of 2026.

item.title: China Warns of OpenClaw Security Risks
item.description: Chinese authorities issue official warning that the popular open-source AI agent could pose significant security risks.

item.title: Claude Code vs Traditional IDEs: Real Developer Workflows
item.description: We spent two weeks using Claude Code as our primary development tool. Here's what worked and what didn't.

item.title: OpenCode Emerges as Open-Source Alternative
item.description: A community-driven coding agent promises AI-assisted development without vendor lock-in.

item.title: Google ADK: Enterprise AI Agents Made Simple
item.description: Google's Agent Development Kit brings AI agents to the enterprise with BigQuery integration.
